title: On-Street Parking Census
description:
A. SUMMARY 
Counts of publicly available, on-street parking for each street segment.

B. METHODOLOGY  
Counts collected via field surveys from 2008-2014 assuming 17 feet per undemarcated parking space, with a few exceptions. Geoprocessing methodology involved a series of spatial joins between side of street points and each street segment. Full parking census methodology can be found at http://sfpark.org/resources/parking-census-data-context-and-map-april-2014/

C. UPDATE FREQUENCY  
Updated infrequently on a schedule TBD

D. OTHER CRITICAL INFO  
Users should filter out segments with the value '5555' when aggregating parking census counts. This code is applied to some divided streets where the full parking census count for that street block was aggregated to one side of the divided street.

columns.name: objectid
columns.description: An ObjectID is a unique, not null integer field used to uniquely identify rows in tables in a ESRI geodatabase

columns.name: CNN
columns.description: The street centerline segment unique identification number

columns.name: DISTRICT
columns.description: The Supervisor District the segment falls within 1 through 11

columns.name: COLLECTN
columns.description: Whether the data was collected through field surveys or remote through imagery

columns.name: PRKG_SPLY
columns.description: Number of parking spaces on that street segment

columns.name: YEAR
columns.description: The year the data was collected

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was last processed

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was loaded into the Open Data Portal
